name: Light the Beacons
description:
Light the Beacons

Mouse controls:

  • left click on Black or White smoke buttons to release smoke
  • left click on demons to kill them

Objective:

  • pattern match the smoke from the signal fire in the distance (off to the left)

There is currently no endgame, and no sound. Didn't have a lot of time this weekend and didn't even intend to do Ludum Dare this time, but wanted to try quickly prototyping this idea.
